content.question: In a semi-log plot, which of the following pairs of functions appear linear as parallel lines?

choices.label: <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 x plus 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 x squared"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals ln open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 ln open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
